meanings.definition: The chronic inflammation of the lungs caused by the inhalation of dust.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that coniosis was a result of the lungs' reaction to inhaled particles.
meanings.sent2: Workers in dusty environments are at risk of developing coniosis over time.
